title: Final Fantasy 7 OST [Remastered Edition]
description:
FINAL FANTASY VII Original Soundtrack [Remastered Edition]

Created by Final FanTim

Thread:  <a href="
http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?PHPSESSID=f2abcc3e501e018832c22862876ea5d7&topic=8160.0" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://forums.qhimm.com/index.php?PHPSESSID=f2abcc3e501e018832c22862876ea5d7&topic=8160.0</a>

----------------------------
Info (taken from the thread)

What ?

FF7 OST Remastered Edition contains all of the original tracks but are remastered with REAL HIGH quality instruments (samples). So it sounds a lot better than the original version on both PC and PSX

Why ?

Because I'm a big fan of N. Uematsu  :-D

Usage ?

You can try this with the amazing Ficedula's FFVII Music or just listen to it if you are a fan of the music

PLEASE NOTE:

1. I will not give any kind of tech-related support for software (search the forums)
2. These tracks will not loop correctly in FF7 due lack of cue support in mp3
3. These tracks are not meant as a remix so they will stop abruptly since there based on the original MIDI (which has looping fonction)

*** Here is a small word from FinalFanTim:***

"I gave it my all to let [the tracks] all sound the way i felt when i first played FFVII on the PSX.
The problem is...MIDI instruments don't always sound as real instruments...so i had to deal with complicated stuff like different velocities, volumes, reverb, panning and convert that to real instruments.
And i lack the studio monitors for better sound control/mastering so the music will not sound the same with everybody because of changes in type of speakers, configurations etc."

--------------------------------------
All 320Kbs, All tagged, Seeded on TPB by eiki a.k.a eikimono
